channel.title: Teals on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Teals on C'est la Z

item.title: Lesson plans - scripts to springboards
item.description: I spent last Saturday up at the Microsoft offices in Times Square observing a TEALS training session. My fried Nathaniel Granor, Teals Regional Manager in the east has invited me a number of times and this time I was able to make it. If you don't know, TEALS is a program that takes volunteers in the tech industry and places them in classrooms. Unlike other programs, the TEALS volunteers work with the teachers while the kids learn some CS.
